# requestAuthorization(_:)

**Type Method**

Displays a user interface so that the user can authorize whether your app may view the media library’s contents.

## Declaration

```swift
class func requestAuthorization(_ completionHandler: @escaping (MPMediaLibraryAuthorizationStatus) -> Void)
```

```swift
class func requestAuthorization() async -> MPMediaLibraryAuthorizationStatus
```

## Parameters

- **completionHandler**: A block that the system calls after the user chooses whether to authorize the app.



## Getting the default media library

- **authorizationStatus()**: Returns whether the app can access the user’s media library.
- **MPMediaLibraryAuthorizationStatus**: The list of possible states for authorization to access to the user’s media library.
- **default()**: Returns an instance of the default media library.
